section.title: Enabling a Cluster, Host, or Datastore for Capacity and Utilization Collection

procedure.title: To Enable a Cluster, Host, or Datastore for Capacity and Utilization Collection

step.para: Navigate to ConfigureConfiguration, then click on the Settings accordion.
Select Region, then click on the C & U Collection tab.
In the Clusters area, check all clusters and hosts that you want to collect data for.
In the Datastores area, check all datastores that you want to collect data for.

note.para: As new clusters, hosts, and datastores are discovered, you will need to come back to this configuration to enable collection of capacity and utilization data unless you have used the Collect for All check boxes
